description:
Playful handling, a top-tier groupset, and plenty of tech to keep you seen. For 2022 Cannondale has updated their versatile Synapse frame to include their SmartSense™ technology. This clever bit of kit includes a frame mounted battery, headlight, and taillight. From spicing up your commute, to weekend tours, to giving you the edge on your next club ride, the Synapse 105 wears many hats, and it wears them well. Shimano’s venerable 105 groupset delivers instant shifts and precise velocity control. Little touches like hidden rack mounts, a removeable fender bridge and clearance for larger tires, even give you the option to explore the roads less traveled.

  • SmartSense battery and lighting system helps you see and be seen one the road
  • Headlight max output of 350 lumens and 4 modes: high, twilight, power saver, and pulse. An internal ambient light sensor will even adjust your lights automatically making them brighter when the world around you gets darker
  • Taillight max output of 85 lumens and 4 modes: high, twilight, power saver, and pulse. Brake mode brightens as you slow, increasing visibility in sudden stop situations
  • Free Cannondale SmartSense app controls your lights
  • Battery lasts for 2.75h on high and 20h on power saver mode
  • 4 level LED display lets you know when it is time to charge your battery, it charges from empty in 3h over USB-C
  • Light and strong carbon frame and fork is nimble, yet comfortable
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Removable fender bridge and stealthy rack/fender mounts, and room for up to 35mm tires, give this frame touring versatility
  • Proportional response size specific design lets riders of all sizes enjoy the same aggressive road geometry
  • Shimano 105 hydraulic disc brakes keep your speed right where you want it
  • 2x11 drivetrain pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano 105 groupset
  • Vittoria Zaffiro Pro reflective tires are grippy, have low rolling resistance, and help keep you seen
  • Weatherproofing: lights are IPX7 and the battery is IP65, if you’re willing to ride in it, your lights will keep shining
  • Battery weight: 180g
  • Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more
  • Wheel sensor works with ANT+ or Bluetooth and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Synapse Carbon 3 L Bicycle - Unisex
